'''Beta 1.16.0.58''' is the tenth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.0]], released on April 22, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360042617911|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.16.0.58 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=April 22, 2020}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''Crashes'''
* Fixed a crash that could occur when checking for Marketplace content updates.
* Android users will no longer crash when opening the Marketplace ({{bug|MCPE-68973}}).

'''Gameplay'''
* Potions in cauldrons can now be correctly removed.
* [[Fishing rod]] can now be used repeatedly when holding the interact button ({{bug|MCPE-63090}}).

'''User interface'''
* Double tapping [[Item|Items]] on touch screen devices now groups those items together correctly again ({{bug|MCPE-66458}}).
* Using the 'craft all' function with a controller now works correctly again ({{bug|MCPE-65747}}).
* Searching in the inventory will now update the results correctly ({{bug|MCPE-69039}}).

'''Scripting and add-ons'''
* {{cd|pre_effect_script}} no longer runs when an entity is despawning with {{cd|minecraft:despawn}}.</onlyinclude>
